description: Manage sku/zone/region recommender info for compute resources.

commands.name: az compute-recommender spot-placement-recommender
commands.summary: Generate placement scores for Spot VM skus.
commands.syntax:
az compute-recommender spot-placement-recommender --desired-count
                                                  --desired-locations
                                                  --desired-sizes
                                                  [--availability-zones {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--location]
                                                  [--subscription]
examples: az compute-recommender spot-placement-recommender -l eastus --subscription ffffffff-ffff-ffff-ffff-ffffffffffff --availability-zones true --desired-locations '["eastus", "eastus2"]' --desired-count 1 --desired-sizes '[{"sku": "Standard_D2_v2"}]'
